Articles.Content: I'm trying to build more realistic/complex AFVs to use with BDArmory, the problem is that while there is a couple of stock generators, I need some that are bigger, and produce more power. There was a mod that had exactly what I needed. But I've completely forgotten the name and I've already spent 2 hours looking for it. I'd appreciate any help, and thanks in advance.

Welcome to the forums!

Near Future ships a custom generator module for its Electrical subpack, to simulate nuclear reactors. Not sure if that's what you need, but well, your query is vague...  

Edited July 11, 2017 by Streetwind
Thank you for that, but do you possibly remember any with a boxier model?

11 hours ago, sergentjhonson said:

I'm trying to build more realistic/complex AFVs to use with BDArmory, the problem is that while there is a couple of stock generators, I need some that are bigger, and produce more power. There was a mod that had exactly what I needed. But I've completely forgotten the name and I've already spent 2 hours looking for it. I'd appreciate any help, and thanks in advance.

Hi kerbal foundries APU is what you need and the part module I use in a lot of the vehicles my AFV mod, don't start the engine you don't go anywhere, as it should be
